Head Bounce @ Lake in the Hills Skatepark

Description: I went to the park earlier than usual to skate before an afternoon appointment. This was the second or third drop-in. I meant to just warm up but had a little too much speed and hung my front trucks. I went down like a bag of potatoes and managed to smack my head on the flat. I didn't always wear a helmet when warming up but was glad I did it that day.
Published: Sep 28, 2020
Watch on Youtube
